Name: Incomplete Documentation
Description:
The documentation, whether on paper or in electronic form, does
					not contain descriptions of all the relevant elements of the product, such as
					its usage, structure, interfaces, design, implementation, configuration,
					operation, etc.
ExtendedDescription: This issue makes it more difficult to maintain the software, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities.  It also might make it easier to introduce vulnerabilities.
